head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths DELAPENA, HARVEY V.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths DELAPENA, HARVEY V.

block.p: DELAPENA-Harvey V. Husband of Joanne (Young). Father of Stephen & Bradford Delapena & Susan Cava. Also survived by 3 grandchildren & a sister Mimi Turner. Visiting hours Sunday 2-5 pm in John-Lawrence Funeral Home, Marstons Mills, MA. Memorials in his name to C-O-MM Rescue Squad, 1875 Falmouth Rd., Centerville, MA 02632.
